name: Hilton Garden Inn Preston Casino Area

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A very well furnished hotel that was clean and comfortable. Staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Breakfast setup was unique with a chef for custom items. The A/C functioned perfectly. The refrigerator was cool, when we arrived.
reviews.title: Preston HGI

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very nice and conveniently located to Foxwoods casino. It was wonderful to have a non smoking hotel after being in the casino. The woman at the bar, I think Jen, was so accommodating and friendly. The front desk woman offered us bottled water as a hiltons reward member and explained all the amenities
reviews.title: great find

reviews.text: I enjoyed the stay. The check-in was smooth. The shuttle service to Foxwoods was fast and easy, the driver was pleasant and helpful. The breakfast contained a good selection and the manager and cook were helpful to make sure everything was available and to assist the guests.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was beautiful, clean, friendly and amazing price for the service provided. Hotel is very close to Foxwoods (offers free shuttle service too). Our stay also included a breakfast buffet that was awesome ....must try their waffles. Staff went out of their way to make sure we enjoyed our stay. Highly recomend this hotel.
reviews.title: Excellent Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I travel for business and stay at about 120 hotels per year. My wife and I were looking for a Foxwoods getaway for one evening, but did not want to spend the money to stay at the casino. We did very well selecting this hotel. Location is 3 minutes to Foxwoods. Free shuttle runs every hour until 1245am. The hotel is brand new and modern. Beds and furniture are in like-new condition. Rooms are clean and well appointed(fridge, microwave, free WIFI, coffee maker, HDTV). Check-in/out was quick and easy. Very friendly front desk staff, as well as the van drivers and cleaning crew. We missed the shuttle by 1 minute, and they made a special run just for us. During the brief wait for the shuttle, we grabbed a drink at the lounge. Friendly bartender, $4.25 for a decent local brew. The food menu prices appeared to be on the high side, however comparable to the restaurants at the casino. It's difficult to find negatives about this place, I suppose the price for the room may be a little high, but compared to other hotels it was certainly worth it. I highly recommend this hotel
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.text: Great hotel for the money. Front desk very pleasant and the restaurant service was acceptable. I wanted to be short and sweet with my review but this site makes you put in over 200 characters as a minimum. I am more unhappy with this site than I am with the hotel.
reviews.title: great stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel because of its location, we were going to see a comedy show at the casino. The people at the front desk were very nice, the lobby of this hotel was clean and the room was very, very nice. I enjoyed my stay!!
reviews.title: Pleased

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we were in a room that had an air condition unit below the window. the thing was so loud everytime it came on it woke me up. the fan in the bathroom can't be turned off so it hummed the whole time we were there. we asked for late check out. but I could not wait to get out of there,don't think I will stay at the hotel again
reviews.title: need central air

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here on a Fri night using points to discount the rate to $65 or so. The main reason we stayed here of course was to use the shuttle to Foxwoods, and that has to be the primary reason for everyone or nearly everyone staying at this hotel. The staff were very friendly and pleasant and there was always someone at the door greeting people or saying have a good day. Check in and check out was a breeze and the staff was very friendly.
reviews.title: Great property!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As for the property it's brand new, only a few months old and very well laid out. The lobby had plenty of free water/tea/cookies when we arrived and fresh coffee/tea in the morning and had lots of nice spots for "hanging out" and conversing with friends. We did not use the restaurant/bar but it looked nice. Each floor has 2 large wings and there are 4 floors including the first, so it's a pretty good sized hotel. It was pretty filled up when we were there, people were still checking in at 11:50PM!
reviews.title: Hilton Garden Inn near casino
Great place to stay!!!!!
reviews.text: I really enjoyed my stay at the Hilton Garden Inn in July 2013. I arrived at 8:30 a.m. on a Wednesday after a long drive and I stopped in the hotel lobby to let the desk clerk know I arrived in the area and would be back later to check-in. To my amazement, she told me I could check in right away! I was so happy I could take all the food and drinks I had in a cooler in the car and put them in the room fridge and get myself settled in my room before setting out to enjoy what Foxwoods Resort has to offer. The hotel room is smallish, but adequate and well equipped with fridge, tv, coffeemaker, and hairdryer, and the beds are comfortable. One thing I didn't like about the room is the exit door is blocked when the bathroom door is opened. It seems like the Hilton wanted to squeeze every amount of available space they could into this property with smallish rooms and tightly squeezed areas. The indoor pool is surrounded by hotels rooms right next to it and the restaurant is really part of the hotel lobby with tables and chairs that look like a cocktail should be enjoyed there instead of a nice meal, but the hotel offers room service. I wondered why they didn't put up a wall to separate the restaurant from the lobby. There is coffee or lemon water in the lobby 24 hours a day which is a nice touch. A free shuttle is available from the Hilton to Foxwoods casinos. A good Italian restaurant named Eli's is a short drive down the road or they will deliver food to the hotel. I would highly recommend staying at the Hilton when visiting this area.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I was thinking Hilton garden Inn was going to just be another hotel. I was surprised that each time I passed through the lobby I was addressed by name. The staff on my return trip remembered me. As well as the restaurant staff. they also remembered the meals we had during our previous stay. we were treated and I mean this sincerely like family.
reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST HOTEL EXPERIENCES EVER

reviews.text: Our stay at the Hilton Garden Inn in Ledyard CT was excellent. The Staff was friendly and extremely helpful and the room was very comfortable. The children enjoyed the pool and jacuzzi and it is so close to Foxwoods which is excellent and a plus for me. I would definitely recommend this hotel to my family and friends and I have already booked my room for October.
reviews.title: Family Fun

reviews.text: I rented a suite for my wife and i for our anniversary here. I requested feather free because my wife is deathly allergic to feathers. I was assured when checking in that it was all set however when we got to the room there were feather pillows on the bed. I called the desk and they sent someone up with new pillows. Later starting the whirlpool tub for my wife and i left us in a bath with floating flakes and particles o mold in the tub. Already aggravated we decided to just go to bed, when turning down the sheets there on the bed was anywhere between 10-20 head hairs bth on the pillows and in the sheets. I pulled the sheets all the way down and there half way down there were a couple of pubic hairs in the sheets as well. When i called the night manager i was told there was nothing they could do other than offering me free breakfast. It took me fifteen minutes of arguing with the manager for him to send up new sheets, and i had to ask for them numerous times. The GM was very apologetic however i will choose to not stay at this hotel next time, ill be happy to spend the extra cash if it means not having an issue like this on a night thats neant to be hassle free and romantic.
reviews.title: Bad experience, marriot it will be from now on.

reviews.text: I enjoy the Hilton Properties, they are always clean and the staff is very attentive. The beds are usually very comfortable and easy to sleep in. I look forward to staying at any location, because you can expect a great time. Great service from all the staff members. I would recommend these hotel to everyone traveling and looking for a home away from home.
reviews.title: great place to hang your hat.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We choose this hotel because of how close it was to foxwoods. Pricing far superior to the casino. I am writing this review and still here in fact. We found a dead beetle in the room on air conditioner this morning. Left it there as a test to see if maid would take care of..came back she failed still there. Its dead so no big deal but was a good test. As one of the other reviewers said breakfeast here leaves a lot to be desired. I have hilton honors so i didnt pay but i feel bad for those who did. They will pay the first time but i bet you they wont come back. This hould be included in your room based on what you get. 2 servers the female very attentive the male didnt want to be there. Horrible . Why colnt i have gotten the girl not my luck. Some tables are cocktail tables dont belong there for breakfeast. Beds in room comfortable air a little difficult to keep adjusted right and a little noisy since they are window wall commercial air conditioners. Overall though as long as you dont want to eat here this hotel will satify your needs. Staff is fanrastic !!!!
reviews.title: Reasonable alternative

reviews.text: Attended a concert at Foxwoods and stayed the night here. Hotel is great but the breakfeast experience was lacking. Service was slow and selection was poor. Hotel is very nice though, sleek & new. Room was big, tv was nice, shower was big.
reviews.title: Concert night

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We would have given this hotel a overall rating of five except for the following:
reviews.title: Nice Hotel but Disappointed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We book hotels based on their trip advisor rating plus the fact that they are non-smoking and non-pet friendly (except for service dogs). Imagine our surprise when we turned down the hall to go to our room after a night out to hear a yapping dog all the way down the hall. The dog, it turns out, was directly across the hall from our room. We immediately went to the front desk and inquired about the dog and to make sure the policy was correct on their website. The manager said she made an exception to their no pets allowed rule because the people were "Diamond Hilton Honors" members. She had blocked off the rooms around this particular room (410) and asked the people to keep the dog quiet (which they didn't). She blocked off the rooms around them but apparently didn't consider us across the hall. We were truly disappointed to find out, once again in life, that rules are made for only certain people to follow. If these people were "Diamond Hilton Honors" members they should have known the hotel policy. Does Hilton allow this at all of their hotels?
reviews.title: A new hotel with some things still being straightened out.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We feel the management disrespected especially us and all hotel visitors that night by allowing a dog in their hotel. Rules are rules no matter who you are.
reviews.title: Hilton Garden Inn by Foxwoods
